import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-slick' import ava1 from '../../assets/images/ava1.png' import ava2 from '../../assets/images/ava2.png' const Testimonial = () => { const settings= { dots:true, infinite:true, autoplay:true, speed:1000, swipeToSlide:true, autoplaySpeed:2000, slidesToShow:3, responsive:[ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, }, }, ] } return
